class.name: UnivariatePointValuePair

javadoc.text: This class holds a point and the value of an objective function at this * point. * This is a simple immutable container.
Value of the objective function at the point.
Build a point/objective function value pair.
javadoc.param: value Value of an objective function at the point

javadoc.text: Get the value of the objective function.
javadoc.return: the stored value of the objective function.
